title: The Magic Feed That Saved Tadej Poga훾ar at Paris-Roubaix Is Not What You Think it Was
content:
What was the elixir that put the legs back onto Poga훾ar's wild ride Sunday at the 'Hell of the North?' It's not for those with a weak stomach.

Read the full article at The Magic Feed That Saved Tadej Poga훾ar at Paris-Roubaix Is Not What You Think it Was on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
